body.name: Unicorn Fruit Scented Washable Colored Pencils Set, Glitter Color Pens Case, 63PCS Art Supplies for Kids, Art Crafts Coloring Kit Birthday Valentine's Day Gifts for Girls 4 5 6 7 8 9 Year Old
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Thursday, February 22 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35. Order within 2 hrs 37 mins
features: 🦄【Infinitely Creative Art Supplies】An all-in-one art kit that includes everything a young aspiring artist needs to express their creativity and unleash their inner unicorn. 12 Stamp Color Pens, 12 Scented Color Pens, 12 Scented Glitter Gel Pens, 12 Mini Colored Pencils, 8 Twistable Crayons, 1 Coloring Book, 1 Drawing Pad, 3 Unicorn Style Stickers, 1 Unicorn Pencil Case, 1 Sharpener, that's a total of 63 accessories. Your little girl can color and design dreams in any way she likes.

🦄 【Vibrant and Scented】These brightly colored pens bring any artwork to life. Whether it's coloring in a unicorn, creating a rainbow, or designing a magical creature, this drawing kit will provide you with endless hours of artistic fun. Another unique feature is the delicious fruity scent that comes from the color pens and gel pens. Each color is associated with a different fruit scent, adding extra enjoyment to your child's art projects and making coloring a more sensory experience.

🦄 【Washable and Safe】This art supplies are also washable, making clean-up a breeze for parents and ensuring that clothes and surfaces stay stain-free. So parents can have peace of mind knowing that their little Picasso can create masterpieces without leaving behind difficult-to-remove stains. This feature also encourages children to explore their creativity freely and without worries about making a mess. Simply wash off any marks with soap and water, and you're good to go.

🦄 【Portable Glitter Tote Bag】The unicorn case contains 4 zippered compartments, making it easy for your little girl to keep her pens organized. The glittery design makes it an attractive accessory for any young artist. The case is compact and lightweight, when she is finished coloring, she can stow the case away, closing it with a velcro fastener, perfect for taking on the go for playdates, trips, or schools.

🦄 【Unicorn Coloring Gifts for Girls】This practical and fun color pencil set makes for a great unicorn-themed gift for a Birthday, Christmas, or a special prize. Suitable for girls aged 4 5 6 7 8 9 years old who adore unicorns and all things magical. They'll be thrilled to receive such a unique and thoughtful present that encourages their artistic talents and allows them to create their own drawings, stamp their favorite pattern, and apply their favorite stickers.
body.description: Introducing the Unicorn Fruit Scented Washable Colored Pencil Set with Glitter Pencil Case, the ultimate art supplies for kids ages 4-6-8. This magical mess-free set is perfect for young artists who love to express their creativity while immersing themselves in a world of unicorns and fruity scents.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect for a unicorn loving artist
reviews.reviewText: This was a great set for my unicorn loving artist in my family. We have to wait in waiting rooms a lot, so it is great to have a selection of art supplies that are easily carried/stored for those waiting room times.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Nice Basic Art Supplies
reviews.reviewText: We recently bought my older daughter some nice art supplies. My younger daughter wanted to play as well, so we got her this nice little set. I like that it keeps things organized, but it can be tough for her, 4 years old, to get the colors out that she needs. The larger markers are almost the same size as the zipper. Everything works great.Nothing is scented so I am not sure why that is advertised. Also the "coloring book" and "drawing pad" are very minimal. Wouldn't expect them to keep your child long for happy so have some more paper ready to go. I do recommend.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 22, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars My niece loves unicorns and drawing! This was perfect!
reviews.reviewText: The overall presence of this was smaller than I expected. However, it was great for smaller hands. My niece is 8 so if I got her something larger, it would be very overwhelming for her. The markers all worked well. The case was the perfect size for everything. And as 8 year old go, I am sure she will be on to something else, so not spending a ton of money on this. Good for gift giving.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 18, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Unicorn Coloring Set
reviews.reviewText: This set comes with several different writing utensils including markers, pens, colored pencils an more. There are two small little notebooks as well. Everything packs away neatly into this this eye catching sparkly pink zipper pouch. I love that all the little compartments have easy to open zippers to make for easy clean up and organization. I got this as a gift for my niece that is 3 years old and she loves it! The description states that markers are scented, when opening them I don't seem to smell any strong scents. If there are any scents they are very faint. In my opinion that did not take away from the set itself. Very giftable. 5 stars.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Nothing was scented but still great gift for a 5yr old
reviews.reviewText: Our family does a lot of old school together time such as at projects and contention between the teen and the kindergartener is common due to .... Let's call it technique. I ordered this kit for the little so she could mash those felt tip markers to her little hearts delight with out interference from the older kid.Right away I was impressed with the carrying case. Glitter on top of glitter is our favorite color and this is beautifully sparkly. The variety of supplies inside is exactly as depicted in the item listing but seems more impressive in person. All the things worked and have great color saturation.The only downside i observed is nothing is scented. End of the day that's not a big deal for us but it could be important to others

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Cute and Travel Friendly Art Set
reviews.reviewText: Got the Rocamdo Unicorn Fruit Scented Washable Colored Pencils Set for my nieces, and it is a delightful and comprehensive art supplies kit that exceeded my expectations. The 63-piece set comes with a vibrant array of colored pencils, each exuding a fruity scent that adds an extra layer of sensory enjoyment to the creative process. The washable feature is a game-changer, allowing for stress-free cleanup. The inclusion of a glitter pencil case is cute and ensures convenient storage and portability. This art kit is exceptionally well-suited for young artists, especially girls aged 4 to 9, offering a perfect balance of fun and educational value. From the quality of the colored pencils to the thoughtfully designed glitter case, this Rocamdo set makes for an ideal Christmas or birthday gift, fostering creativity and artistic exploration in a delightful and scented manner. My nieces actually ripped it open immediately on Christmas and began to color (all of the markers that they used worked really well).

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 11, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very thorough for gift giving
reviews.reviewText: This is great to have for my grandchildren to visit and use. There are many different pens, pencils, gel pens and other items. The colors are beautiful and vivid for many hours of drawing and coloring.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 21, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Unicon Scented Art Supplies!!
reviews.reviewText: Is there someone in your life who is into unicorns and like to draw or color? This set will be the perfect gift for their birthday or Christmas. The entire collection is separated into 4 zippered pouch. The first pouch is the Watercolor Stampers. The second pouch is the SCENTED Watercolor pens. The 3rd pouch is the twistable crayons. The last pouch are the mini color pencils and mini SCENTED glitter pens. The mini items measure 3 inches long. Also included in the last pouch is a cheap pencil sharpener that looks really low quality. Outside the pouches, you get a coloring book, drawing pad, and several sheets of unicorn-themed stickers. The thickness of the coloring book and drawing pad is quite thin. When coloring on one page, you can see the backend of the other pack very easily.Packaging-wise, the entire pencil 'case' is placed in a clear plastic bag with no additional box or artwork.Overall, this is a decent off-brand set of art supplies. Would be nice if the scented items have a label stating what smell the ink has instead of leaving it a mystery.
